Iwan Bule Ingin PSSI Punya Kantor Sendiri
04 Nov 2019, 22:04 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI hingga saat ini belum memiliki kantor tetap. Sejak terusir dari kawasan Gelora Bung Karno (GBK), Senayan, Jakarta, pada 2016 lalu lantaran adanya renovasi untuk Asian Games 2018, federasi sepak bola di Tanah Air itu telah berpindah kantor sebanyak tiga kali.
Awalnya, PSSI berkantor di Grand Rubina yang terletak di kawasan Kuningan. Setelah itu mereka pindah ke rumah mewah di kawasan Kemang Timur, sebelum akhirnya menyewa tempat di FX Sudirman hingga sekarang.
Ketua Umum (Ketum) PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan pun berharap agar organisasi yang dipimpinnya itu bisa punya kantor sendiri. Pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule ini juga berharap agar pemerintah bisa mewujudkannya.
"Gedung menjadi catatan dalam visi-misi kami. PSSI harus kerja sama dengan pemerintah. Tidak mudah memang mencari lahan. Insya Allah bisa kita lihat kalau tidak salah ada beberapa lahan di GBK. Kami memimpikan soccer camp," ujar Iwan Bule usai melakukan pertemuan dengan Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Menpora), Zainudin Amali di Kantor Kemenpora, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
"Insya Allah kami lakukan maksimal sehingga terealisasi. Kami ingin punya gedung. Vietnam, Thailand, Filipina, dan Malaysia punya gedung. Semoga pak Menpora bisa sampaikan harapan ini ke pak Presiden RI, Joko Widodo dan menteri terkait lainnya," katanya menambahkan.

Iwan Bule Wants PSSI to Have Its Own Office
Nov 04 2019, 22:04 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI does not yet have a permanent office. Since being driven out of the Gelora Bung Karno (GBK) area, Senayan, Jakarta, in 2016 due to renovations for the 2018 Asian Games, the football federation in the country has moved offices three times.
Initially, PSSI was based in Grand Rubina, located in the Kuningan area. After that they moved to a luxury house in the East Kemang area, before finally renting a place in FX Sudirman until now.
PSSI General Chairman (Ketum), Mochamad Iriawan also hopes that the organization he leads can have his own office. The man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule also hopes that the government can make it happen.
"The building is a record in our vision and mission. PSSI must cooperate with the government. It is not easy to find land. God willing, we can see if there is not some land in GBK. We dream of soccer camp," said Iwan Bule after meeting with Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora), Zainudin Amali at the Kemenpora Office, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
"God willing, we do the maximum so that it is realized. We want to have a building. Vietnam, Thailand, the Philippines, and Malaysia have a building. Hopefully the Minister of Youth and Sports can convey this hope to the President of Indonesia, Joko Widodo and other relevant ministers," he added.
